channel.title: How to add words in the client?
channel.description:
Ok, so I opened up my client.java and changed all the names of the client to my server name. (client sided) So I clicked compile and everything worked on the client interface. But when I logged into the game it still said the old Creator and who the old owner of the server was, I checked all in client.java and its not there. How do I change what it says In-Game?
Thanks Guys.
Every (good) answer is Rep++

item.title: How to add words in the client?
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]get JCreator for free. Open up one of the java files in the server folder. Hit CTRL + F then search for what the servername/owners are and change the thing it searches to the entire directory of the server. It will go through each java file and find the word your searching for.

Saves alot of time if you have no idea where a piece of code is[/font]

Read full topic
item.source: How to add words in the client?

item.title: How to add words in the client?
item.dc:creator: @iAmChase iAmChase
item.description:
@iAmChase wrote:

[quote=“Lord Typhis, post:3, topic:351942”]In the client that I have, there is no client.java on the server side.[/quote] I suggest you get a different source then, Or are you running on a 562 ?

Read full topic
